title: Likely a stupid question
content:
But thought I’d ask it anyway. Are Mac TT fonts okay to use on a PC or do I need to purchase the PC TT font?

 [‹ Universal Font Classification System](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16326 "Go to previous forum topic") [Embedding Images In Posts.. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16230 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content: Mac TT fonts will NOT work on PCs. (PC TT fonts will work on Macs running OS X, though.)

when generating font files in FOG, can you just select PC TT to make a PC font?

sorry if that’s obvious... (just trying to learn and i don’t have a pc)
